scripts.install-global: sudo npm install -g gulp-jshint gulp-browserify gulp-concat gulp-sass gulp-autoprefixer gulp-minify-css gulp-rename gulp-uglify gulp
scripts.link-global: sudo npm link gulp-jshint & sudo npm link gulp-browserify & sudo npm link gulp-concat & sudo npm link gulp-sass & sudo npm link gulp-autoprefixer & sudo npm link gulp-minify-css & sudo npm link gulp-rename & sudo npm link gulp-uglify & sudo npm link gulp
